gurmukhi: qurw mn n dwnm ik XzdwN Snws ] brwmd iz qU kwrhw idl ^rwS ]
transliteration: Turaa Man Na Daanam Ki Yazdaan Shanaas|| Baraamad Zi Too Kaarahaa Dil Kharaash||85||
translation: I do not believe that man recognizes the Lord, who injures the sentiments of others through his action.85.

gurmukhi: Snwsd hmIN qU n XzdwN krIm ] n ^Íwhd hmI qU bdOlq AzIm ]86]
transliteration: Shanaasad Hameen Too Na Yazdaan Dareem||na Khvaahad Hamitoo Badaulat Azeem||86||
translation: The Ture and Merciful Lord does not love you, though you have unaccountable wealth.86.

gurmukhi: Agr sd kurwN rw bKurdI ksm ] mrw eyqbwry n eIN zrh dm ]87]
transliteration: Agad Sad Kuraan Raa Bakhurdikasam|| Maraa Etbhare Na Een Zarah Dam||87||
translation: Even if you swear a hundred times by the Quran, I shall never trust you.87.

gurmukhi: hzUrq inAwXm n eIN rh Svm ] Agr Sh b^Íwnd mn AwN jw rvm ]88]
transliteration: Hazoorat Niaayam Na In Rah Shavam|| Agad Shah Bakhvaanad Man Aan Jaa Ravam||88||
translation: I cannot come to you and am not prepared to tread your path of oaths; I shall go, wherever my Lord will ask me to go.88.

gurmukhi: ^uSs Swih Swhwn AOrMgzyb ] ik cwlwk dsqu Asqu cwbuk rkyb ]89]
transliteration: Khoushas Shaahe Shaahaan Auranzeb|| Ki Dhaalaak Dast(u) Ast(u) Chaabouk Rakeh||89||
translation: You are king of king, O fortunate Aurangzeb; you are a clever administrator and a good horseman.89.

gurmukhi: ic husnul jmwlsqu rOSn zmIr ] ^udwvMd mulk Asqu swihib AmIr ]90]
transliteration: Chi Housnul Jamaalast(u) Raoushan Zameer|| Khudaavand Mulk Ast(u) Saahibe Ameer||90||
translation: With the help of your intelligence and the sword, you have become the master of Deg and Tegh.90.

gurmukhi: ik qrqIb dwinS b qdbIr qyZ ] ^udwvMid dygo ^udwvMd qyZ ]91]
transliteration: Ki Tarteeb Daanish Ba Tadbeer Tegh|| Khudaavand(i) Dego Khudaavand Teg||91||
translation: You are the acme of beauty and wiseom; you are the chief of chiefs and the king.91.

gurmukhi: ik rOSn zmIr Asqu husnul jmwl ] ^udwvMd b^iSMdhy mulku mwl ]92]
transliteration: Ki Raoushan Zameer Ast(u) Housnul Jamaal|| Khudaavand Bakhshind-he Mulko Maal||92||
translation: You are the acme of beauty and wisdom; you are the master of the country and its wealth.92.

gurmukhi: ik b^iSS kbIr Asqu dr jMg koh ] mlwXk is&q cUM sur`Xw iSkoh ]93]
transliteration: Ki Bakhshish Kabeer Ast(u) Dar Jan Koh|| Malaayak Sifat Choon Surayyaa Shikoh||93||
translation: You are most generous and a mountain in the battlefield; you are like angels wielding high splendour.93.

gurmukhi: SihnSwh AOrMgzyb AwlmIN ] ik dwrwie dOr Asqu dUr Asq dIN ]94]
transliteration: Shahinshaah Auranzeb Aalmeen Purfitan|| Ki Daaraae|| Ki Daaraae Daur Ast(u) Door Ast Deen||94||
translation: Though you are the king of kings, O Aurangzeb ! you are far from righteousness and justice.94.

gurmukhi: mnm kuSqhAm koihXwN puriPqn ] ik AwN buq prsqMdu mn buqiSkn ]95]
transliteration: Manam Koushtaham Kohiyaan Purfitan|| Ki Aan Bout Parastand(u) Man Bout-shikan||95||
translation: I vanquished the vicious hill chiefs, they were idol-worshippers and I am idol-breaker.95.

gurmukhi: bbIN grdiS byv&wey zmwN ] pis puSq au&qd rswnd izXwN ]96]
transliteration: Babeen Gaddashe Bewafaae Zamaan|| Pase Pousht Uftad Rasaanad Ziyaan||96||
translation: Look at the time-cycle, quite undependable; whosoever it pursues, it brings his decline.96.

gurmukhi: bNbI kudriq nyk Xzdwin pwk ] ik Az Xk b dh l`k rswnd hlwk ]97]
transliteration: Babeen Kudrate Nek Yazdaane Paak|| Ki Az Ak Ba Dah Lakk Rasaanad Halaak||97||
translation: Think of the power of the Holy Lord, which causes one persons to kill lakhs of people.97.

gurmukhi: ich duSmn kund imhrbwN As dosq ] ik b^iSMdgI kwr b^iSMdh Esq ]98]
transliteration: Chih Doushman Kounad Meharbaan Ast Dost|| Ki Bakhshindagikaar Bakhshindah Ost||98||
translation: If God is friendly, no enemy can do anything; the generous action proceed from the merciful Lord.98.
